[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Marker](./blockly.marker_class.md)

## Marker class

Class for a marker. This is used in keyboard navigation to save a location in the Blockly AST.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Marker 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colour](./blockly.marker_class.colour_property.md) |  | string \| null | The colour of the marker. |
|  [type](./blockly.marker_class.type_property.md) |  | string | The type of the marker. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.marker_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  | Dispose of this marker. |
|  [getCurNode()](./blockly.marker_class.getcurnode_1_method.md) |  | Gets the current location of the marker. |
|  [getDrawer()](./blockly.marker_class.getdrawer_1_method.md) |  | Get the current drawer for the marker. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.marker_class.hide_1_method.md) |  | Hide the marker SVG. |
|  [setCurNode(newNode)](./blockly.marker_class.setcurnode_1_method.md) |  | Set the location of the marker and call the update method. Setting isStack to true will only work if the newLocation is the top most output or previous connection on a stack. |
|  [setDrawer(drawer)](./blockly.marker_class.setdrawer_1_method.md) |  | Sets the object in charge of drawing the marker. |
